translations: 大声叫的，喊叫的，喧嚷的；激昂的

sentences.sentence: He was a vociferous opponent of Conservatism.
sentences.translation: 他是保守主义的强烈反对者。

sentences.sentence: Calls to draw on reserves are most vociferous in America.
sentences.translation: 在美国，动用石油储备的呼喊声最强烈。

sentences.sentence: Ironically, Nishitani, one of the more vociferous critics of the new law, agrees.
sentences.translation: 讽刺的是，作为这项新法规的最激烈的批评者之一，西谷也同意这一观点。
